In the name of God, amen, I, Iames Sandys of Block Is.
aleas New Shorum in the Colleny of Road Island & Providence Plan
tation being sick & weak of Body but of Sound & perfectt mind
& memory Prayse be therefoere given to almighty God doe make &
and order this my present last will & testement in manner & forme follow
ing, that is to say first & principally I commend my sule into the
hand of Almighty God hoping through the merritts Death and passio[n]
of [our] saviour Iesus Christ, to have Iust & free pardon of all my sins & to
inheritt etternall life and my body I commit to the Earth to be
Deacently buried at the Discression of my Executtrix hereafter
named & as touching the Disposition of all such temperall Estate
as it hath pleased almighty God to bestow upon me I give & dispose
there of as followeth First I will that all my Detts & funerall Charges be
payd & discharged Item first I give unto my Deer & Loveing wife
Sarah Sandys all my whole estate Reall & personall upon Block
During her naturall Life housing & land houshould goods & liveing stock and
any other Estate whatsoever which now belongeth properly to me not yet
Conveyed by me to any other But after the Deceasse of my Deer wife I
give & Dispose of all my Lands as followeth first I give unto my son
Iames Sandys to him his Heirs Executtors Administrators & Assignes my tractt
of Land in the Southeast Called the High Land & Wegashick plaine
more or Less Leying as It is now fenced buted on the South East by the [sound]
on the North by the stone wall of my cow pasture by the south by my
son Iohn Sandys Land formerly Mr Gutterys on the West on Land I gave
my son Samuell fenced parttly by a wall & parttly by a hedge also I give
unto sayd son Iames half the orchard in the Greatt Swamp the land to
containe two Acres & half for the orchard aforesayd & also all my [part]
of the greatt Lott in the neck Leying between my Son Iohns Land and [that]
formerly Mr [Te]rr[ys] east & west Secondly I give unto my sonn Samuell
Sandys his Heirs Executtors Administrators & Assignes all the tractt of
land that is now Left out to the Land in Common in South East Commo[nly]
called Wegashik plaine & Mr Wharttons one feild butted on the South with
son Iohns Land he had of Mr Guttery on the West by son Iohns land and
mill river & parttly on greatt swamp on the north with the stone
wall on the East by Iames Land by the stone wall & hedges & all me[a]d[ow]
that belong to me in the Corne Neck also I give to Each sonn Iames Sandys
& Samuell A suffitient highway to their severall parts of Land in South East
before menttioned to be through the cow pasture where Iutte East to the
Conveniency & theye are to maintaine sufitient gaitte or barr to prevent
trespass & Damage to the other lands Also I give unto my youngest
son Edward Sandys his Heirs & Assignes all my homstid namly my cow
pasture & meadow & Dam pasture & feild before the dam & Calf pasture
& greatt swamp & half the orchard being bounded as they are now fenced
on Every side with the mill & all other benifits to them belonging &
my other Children which have ben marid Satrday year Ago namely my
sonn Iohn Sandys & my Daughter Sarah Neyls wife of Nathaniel Neyls
who I have given formerly what Estate I doe Designe them & doe
Confirm to Each of them According to their tittles Each &
his heirs & Assigns for Ever & my Daughter Marcy Raymond wife of
Ioshua Raymond who upon her mariage I gave four scare Acres
of land in the Corne Neck unto & by deed of gift ordered to her
my sayd Daughter & her heirs lawfully begotten of her body I doe now
upon good Causes & Considerattion Give the sayd land in the Corne
neck being four scare Acres free from inlaylment to be to my sayd
Daughter marcy Raymond & her husband Ioshua Raymond to them
their heirs Executtors Administrattors & Assigns for Ever to use &
Improve sell & Dispose as they shall think best Also I will that
All liveing stock & houshould Goods & Chattels and any moveable
Estatte whatsoever that my Dere wife Sarah Sandys shall have
the Disposeing of It where & to whome she thinks best all the Rest &
Residue of any other Estate belonging to me that may Appear I doe
now give unto my Deer wife who I will & Appoint shall be my sole
Executrix of this my last will & testement and I doe hereby Revoke
& Disanull all other former will & testament by me heretofore made
by me I now make voyd . In wittness whereof I the sayd Iames Sandys
have sett my hand & seall In Block Island Iune the 18th Anno Domini
1694 sined & sealed In the presenc of us & sined at the top of the
first side & sealed before wittnesed
Iames Sandys his mark S (IS)
Simon Raye
Iohn Rathbone
Christopher Swaine

Be It Known unto all men by these presence
That I Iames Sands Senr of block island alles new shorum
In Road island Colony and providence plantation being by the providence
of allmighty god at this present very Gravly weake and sickley of body but
of sound and perfectt mind and memorey blessed be the Lord for
the same upon god in solled Considerations Doe ad this small
[cadesall unto] my Last will and testament made this Last sumer
past wherin I have settled my Land on this Island to my severall
Sons as therin expresed where as I have given my Son Samuell
Sands his share of Land I gave to my youngest Soon Edward &
on the East with the Land I have willed to my son Iames Sandys
and on the West with my soon Iohn Sandys Land Called his Calves
pasture I will that Iams Sandys shall maintaine all the petssion
Fence betwene Samuels Land & his Sheere of Land In good Repair
for him Said Samuell for the full Space of tenn years to be
maintained on Iames proper Charge and aftur ten years Expired
to be maintain as neighbors ought to Doe and my Son Edward
Sands I requiore to Doe the same to maintaine all the petsion
Fence In the layne betwene them In good Repayre tenn
yere hence and allso to maintaine Samuells Sheere ~
of fence betwene my sonn Iohns Calfs pasture & Samuell
If Iohn Requior any there to be maintained by his brother Samuell
also my son Iames Sandys shall asiste & be at Equal Charge

Iohn and Samuell [] If said fence which now remains
